attributes.action: Stop the system of giving one room per child in social housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people who get Social Housing end up with larger houses than those of us who work - the system should encourage working. People with mortgages and who work make sacrifices like their children sharing bed rooms. We have immigrants arriving here from countries like Morocco where men, women and children share just one bedroom. Our Social housing and welfare system encourages migration to these shores.
